import { memo, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import './HistoryBookingCustomer.scss' function HistoryBookingCustomer({ languageSelected, listBooking }) { const [option, setOption] = useState(0) const today = new Date().toISOString().split("T")[0] const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'VND' }); return (
setOption(0)} className={`w-33 text-center tab-history-booking ${option === 0 && 'tab-history-booking-selected'}`}>asd
setOption(1)} className={`w-33 text-center tab-history-booking ${option === 1 && 'tab-history-booking-selected'}`}>asd
setOption(2)} className={`w-33 text-center tab-history-booking ${option === 2 && 'tab-history-booking-selected'}`}>asd
{listBooking.map((item, index) => (
{item.tourName}
{item.startDate}
{`Adult ${item.numberOfAdult}, children ${item.numberOfChildren}`}
{(item.tourType == 0 && item.status == 0 && today < item.startDate && ) || (item.tourType == 0 && item.status == 1 && today < item.startDate && ) || (item.tourType == 0 && item.status == 1 && today >= item.startDate &&
Da thanh toan {formatter.format(item.price)}
) || (item.tourType == 0 && item.status == 2 && today >= item.startDate && ) || (item.tourType == 1 && item.status == 1 && today < item.startDate && ) || (item.tourType == 1 && item.status == 1 && today >= item.startDate &&
Da thanh toan {formatter.format(item.price)}
) || (item.tourType == 1 && item.status == 2 && today >= item.startDate && ) || (item.tourType == 2 && item.status == 0 && !item.statusDeposit && today < item.startDate && ) || (item.tourType == 2 && item.status == 0 && !item.statusDeposit && today >= item.startDate && ) || (item.tourType == 2 && item.status == 0 && item.statusDeposit && today >= item.startDate && ) || (item.tourType == 2 && item.status == 0 && item.statusDeposit && today < item.startDate && ) || (item.tourType == 2 && item.status == 1 && item.statusDeposit && today >= item.startDate &&
Da thanh toan {formatter.format(item.price)}
) || (item.tourType == 2 && item.status == 2 && )}
Xem chi tiet item
))}
) } export default memo(HistoryBookingCustomer)
